questions.question: A pipe of diameter 466 mm carries water at 25 m/s. The pressure at point A and B are 28 N/cm2 and 23 N/cm2 respectively. Find the loss of head between A and B. Datum line passes through point A.
A pipe of diameter 358 mm carries water at 27 m/s. The pressure at point A and B are 28 N/cm2 and 20 N/cm2 respectively. Find the loss of head between A and B. Datum line passes through point A.
